long_description: An excellent watersports knife, the Gerber River Shorty Knife excels in responding to the unique requirements of rafting, paddling and diving. With its sheath designed expressly for mounting onto a PFD, the River Shorty can be carried into a myriad of high-difficulty, water-related situations. Partially serrated high-carbon stainless-steel blade; blunt tip is ideal for use around inflatable boats. Lightweight, glass-filled nylon handle offers great grip with its notched edges; a few nubs are a bit longer for natural finger placement along the lower edge. The Gerber River Shorty Knife comes with a hard plastic sheath that adeptly serves outdoor watersports; it can can be clipped to a belt, boot or flotation vest.
